title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Point Bonita Lighthouse Temporarily Closed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Point Bonita Lighthouse Temporarily Closed  Access to the Point Bonita Lighthouse will be restricted to the east-side of the Point Bonita Bridge due to emergency maintenance. Closure is expected to last through Sept. 30. For more information, call the Marin Headlands Visitor Center at 415-331-1540.          Tunnel Closure  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Tunnel Closure   The Barry-Baker Tunnel to the Marin Headlands will be closed on Tuesday, August 16, from approximately 12PM - 4PM. An extended tunnel closure will begin in October. For updates & alternate routes visit http://go.nps.gov/tunnel more
